languages.text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's macro-cannons.

The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

languages.text:
船员担心会受到黑暗灵族的惩罚，因此会更加勤奋地工作。
使用{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}进行攻击时，有50%几率额外多开一炮。
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
船员担心会受到黑暗灵族的惩罚，因此会更加勤奋地工作。
使用宏炮进行攻击时，有50%几率额外多开一炮。

languages.text:
Экипаж боится получить наказание от друкари, поэтому трудится более усердно.
При стрельбе из {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g} с шансом 50% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Экипаж боится получить наказание от друкари, поэтому трудится более усердно.
При стрельбе из макропушек с шансом 50% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.

Экипаж боится получить наказание от друкари, поэтому трудится более усердно.
При стрельбе из макропушек с шансом 50% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.

languages.text:
クルーはデュカーリの手による処罰の可能性を恐れ、より熱心に奉仕する。
艦船の{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の攻撃時に50%の確率で追加の射撃を行える。
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
クルーはデュカーリの手による処罰の可能性を恐れ、より熱心に奉仕する。
艦船の{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の攻撃時に50%の確率で追加の射撃を行える。

languages.text:
La tripulación teme el posible castigo a manos del Drukhari y por lo tanto sirve con mayor diligencia.
Hay un 50 % de probabilidad de efectuar un disparo adicional al atacar con los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de la nave.
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La tripulación teme el posible castigo a manos del Drukhari y por lo tanto sirve con mayor diligencia.
Hay un 50 % de probabilidad de efectuar un disparo adicional al atacar con los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de la nave.

languages.text:
Die Crew fürchtet sich vor einer möglichen Bestrafung durch die Drukhari und arbeitet daher noch fleißiger.
Bei Angriffen mit den {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} des Schiffes besteht eine Chance von 50 %, einen zusätzlichen Schuss zu erhalten.
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Crew fürchtet sich vor einer möglichen Bestrafung durch die Drukhari und arbeitet daher noch fleißiger.
Bei Angriffen mit den Makrokanonen des Schiffes besteht eine Chance von 50 %, einen zusätzlichen Schuss zu erhalten.

languages.text:
Craignant le sort que pourraient lui réserver les Drukharis, l'équipage se montre très scrupuleux.
Toute attaque à l'aide des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} du vaisseau a 50 % de chances de bénéficier d'un tir supplémentaire.
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Craignant le sort que pourraient lui réserver les Drukhari, l'équipage se montre très scrupuleux.
Toute attaque à l'aide des macro-canons du vaisseau a 50 % de chances de bénéficier d'un tir supplémentaire.

languages.text:
Mürettebat, Drukharilerin ellerinde cezalandırılmaktan korkarak daha bir gayretle hizmet eder.
Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro toplarıyla{/g} saldırırken %50 oranla ilave bir yuva kazanma olasılığı.
languages.original_text:
The crew fears possible punishment at the hands of the Drukhari and therefore serves more diligently.
There is a 50% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.
